content: NVIDIA's CEO Jensen Huang revealed groundbreaking physical AI, autonomous robots, and industrial automation at CES 2026.

NVIDIA is demonstrating how AI is transitioning from digital screens to real-world applications in factories, robotics, and manufacturing systems, utilizing technologies like Omniverse and Isaac Sim, and the Cosmos foundation model.

Seammens, Cadence, and Synopsis are collaborating with NVIDIA to integrate AI, simulation, and agentic systems across the entire industrial lifecycle, from design and planning to production and operations.

The CES 2026 event highlights next-generation robotics, AI-powered vehicles, industrial automation, and AI physics, offering a glimpse into the future of manufacturing and autonomous systems globally.
